lib/kio.h¶

void write(char *string)¶
Parameters

  • string – string to be write on the screen

void scrollup(unsigned int n)¶
Parameters

  • n – number of char which the screen have to be scrolled

int putchar(int c)¶
Parameters

  • c – character to be write on the screen
